Sentencas: This paper presents a control strategy for a power generation plant based in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Control Strategy for Balance of Plant in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The strategy establishes a stationary regime of operation for the fuel cell using a small battery bank to absorb the dynamic characteristics of the power demand.
Titulo: Control Strategy for Balance of Plant in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In order to make the control strategy the methods of genetic algorithms was used as optimization tool for determining the optimal point in the stationary regime.
Titulo: Control Strategy for Balance of Plant in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: With the control strategy adopted is achieved a bigger efficiency of the equipment due to the absence of misfits in the operation parameters.
Titulo: Control Strategy for Balance of Plant in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: This methodology also promotes an increase in life cycle and reduction the volume and cost of equipment due to operation at the point of maximum efficiency.
Titulo: Control Strategy for Balance of Plant in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A simulation structure was made to test the solutions developed and proposed configuration.
Titulo: Control Strategy for Balance of Plant in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The capability of dynamic response was evaluated with this structure introducing operations conditions based on a residential power demand.
Titulo: Control Strategy for Balance of Plant in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
